text.english: Theorem: \(\texttt{app}\) is associative, i.e. \[ \forall l_1,l_2,l_3 \in L_A . \texttt{app}(\texttt{app}(l_1,l_2), l_3) = \texttt{app}(l_1, \texttt{app}(l_2, l_3)) \]
text.italiano: Teorema: \(\texttt{app}\) e' associativa, i.e. \[ \forall l_1,l_2,l_3 \in L_A . \texttt{app}(\texttt{app}(l_1,l_2), l_3) = \texttt{app}(l_1, \texttt{app}(l_2, l_3)) \]

theorem.coq: Theorem app_assoc: forall (l1 l2 l3 : list) , app ( app l1 l2) l3 = app l1 (app l2 l3).
